txt_en: Time is gentle, granting you a promising beginning.
txt_cn: 岁月温柔，许你一个可期的开头。

txt_en: Wherever your footsteps lead, light will follow.
txt_cn: 步履所向，自有光亮。

txt_en: Snow falls silently, warmth speaks softly. May the world treat you with tenderness.
txt_cn: 雪落无声，温暖有声，愿你被世界温柔以待。

txt_en: The road ahead stretches far, yet I won't dwell on momentary hesitation.
txt_cn: 前路漫漫，不萦一时彷徨。

txt_en: Deep within the chill, warmth stirs within the soil.
txt_cn: 冷至深处，暖意正在土壤里苏醒。

txt_en: Life is not about choices, but about passion.
txt_cn: 生活的真谛不在于选择，而在于热爱。

txt_en: Gentleness is my strength, sharpness is my boundary.
txt_cn: 温柔是我的力量，锋利是我的边界。

txt_en: Turn your face to the sun and the shadows fall behind you.
txt_cn: 向阳而立，阴影自会落在身后。

txt_en: Expect less, and you'll be pleasantly surprised.
txt_cn: 期待少一分，惊喜多十分。

txt_en: When "best" has no boundaries, effort turns into obligation.
txt_cn: 当“最好”永无止境，努力便沦为负累。

txt_en: Morning light crept through the windowpanes.Today brings warm breezes and clear skies.
txt_cn: 晨光漫上窗棂，今日风暖，天色晴和。

txt_en: Amidst complexity, guard the simple core.
txt_cn: 于复杂中，守护简单的内核。

txt_en: A day without troubles is a gift from the universe.
txt_cn: 今日无事，便是宇宙的馈赠。

txt_en: Happiness is made up of many little “just because”.
txt_cn: 幸福是许多微小的“不为什么”。

txt_en: Pack yesterday into your baggage.
txt_cn: 将昨日，叠进行囊。

txt_en: In the material world, build a spiritual high ground.
txt_cn: 在物质的世界里，构建精神的高地。

txt_en: Become the person you want to be, not the person others see you as.
txt_cn: 成为你想成为的人，而非他人眼中的你。

txt_en: Shake hands with every voice, but sign a contract only with your own heart.
txt_cn: 和所有声音握手，但只与自己的心签约。

txt_en: Build an undisturbed city within.
txt_cn: 于内里筑一座无扰的城。

txt_en: Winter pours out its last drops, clearing the stage for spring's entrance.
txt_cn: 冬意倾尽所有，为春的登场清场。

txt_en: Sincerity has its measure. Giving has its limit.
txt_cn: 真诚有尺，付出有度。

txt_en: For a new chapter, pour passion into its foundation once more.
txt_cn: 为新的篇章，再度倾注热爱的底色。

txt_en: Winter sunshine is a limited edition—remember to get outside and soak it up.
txt_cn: 冬日的阳光是限量版，记得多出门晒晒。

txt_en: Hope lights the way, gratitude steadies the soul.
txt_cn: 希望是前行的光，感恩是心中的锚。
